text: When you die, you appear in a cinema with a number of other people who look like you. You find out that they are your previous reincarnations, and soon you all begin watching your next life on the big screen.

Lance believed in an afterlife, a potential heaven that he would go to that would be perfect and full of nothing but joy and happiness. He lived his life the best he could, but found that he didn't do as much as others to benefit mankind as a whole.
